title: 10 Perches House for sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Highly residential area - Nearby our greatest cricketer Sangakkara's residence,

Two bedrooms old house with 10 perches land,(Expecting only land value)

2 mints to Thalawathugoda,

Nearest landmark - Right opposite to Samagi Mawatha and Cargills Food City,

Expecting 10 Million or nearest highest offer,

Viber or IMO - 0777-483555
